import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Material Kit 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";import boxShadow from"assets/theme/functions/boxShadow";var white=colors.white;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{background:"#9fc9ff",fill:"#9fc9ff",stroke:"#9fc9ff",strokeWidth:pxToRem(10),width:pxToRem(13),height:pxToRem(13),borderRadius:"50%",zIndex:99,transition:"all 200ms linear","&.Mui-active":{background:white.main,fill:white.main,stroke:white.main,borderColor:white.main,boxShadow:boxShadow([0,0],[0,2],white.main,1)},"&.Mui-completed":{background:white.main,fill:white.main,stroke:white.main,borderColor:white.main,boxShadow:boxShadow([0,0],[0,2],white.main,1)}}}};
